title: Environmental perspective
author: godlovesjojo
text: Electronic gadgets are conquering the world. MOOC will also encourage use of such gadgets. But with so much e waste accumulating, how will we hand over a clean environment to our future generations. There should be a MOOC on proper use of gadgets and disposal of e wastes.

replies.author: Senthil1970
replies.text: The e-waste is definitely a concern. However, if the same information / knowledge reached out through printed books, we need to look at the environmental effect. The potential of technology and MOOC is immense hence in my view, its contributing the positive environment impact while delivering the effective program at this scale.
